text: I exist as I am, that is enough.
Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul.
Be patient toward all that is unsolved in your heart.
source: Rainer Maria Rilke, Letters to a Young Poet

text: Attention is the beginning of devotion.
Love takes off the masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
source: James Baldwin, The Fire Next Time

text: The beauty of the world has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
source: Virginia Woolf, A Room of One's Own

text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
